17.fullDescription:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `run(uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
17.name: ArithmeticVulnerability

10.fullDescription:

	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/data/thaovttest1/source_code/integer_overflow_mul.sol#10): it allows old versions
